Articles.Content:
I could swear that there used to be a trim setting on ALT+W / ALT+S but it didn't seem to be doing anything in game so I had a look in the options for the trim but couldn't find it anywhere.

Did there used to be a trim or did I dream that up and if so what happened to it?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-02T11:41:15Z" title="08/02/2015 11:41  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 2, 2015</time> by MartGonzo**
There is trim yes, but I just noticed that if you have SAS active, trimming won't do anything, so try disabling SAS and see if that will make any difference

> 
> There is trim yes, but I just noticed that if you have SAS active, trimming won't do anything, so try disabling SAS and see if that will make any difference

Many thanks SalehRam, that must have been why it didn't work.

I'll give that a try.
